description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a diagnosis or finding. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Diagnosis' subset with subset original id 1261000000136; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Diagnosis simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000711000000101 or any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Finding' subset with subset original id 1461000000137; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Finding simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000781000000108.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
